name: A. Math Division
statement:
Ecrade has an integer x. He will show you this number in the form of a
binary number of length n.There are two kinds of operations. Replace x
with
left
lfloor
dfrac{x}{2}
right
rfloor, where
left
lfloor
dfrac{x}{2}
right
rfloor is the greatest integer
le
dfrac{x}{2}. Replace x with
left
lceil
dfrac{x}{2}
right
rceil, where
left
lceil
dfrac{x}{2}
right
rceil is the smallest integer
ge
dfrac{x}{2}. Ecrade will perform several operations until x becomes 1.
Each time, he will independently choose to perform either the first
operation or the second operation with probability
frac{1}{2}.Ecrade wants to know the expected number of operations he
will perform to make x equal to 1, modulo 10^9 + 7. However, it seems a
little difficult, so please help him!
